item.title: Do more w/ less for building blazing fast apps on mobile
item.description:
Do more w/ less for building blazing fast apps on mobile

Fast, light, and performant mobile web apps are possible even on mediocre devices. My 18 minute talk explains: http://www.thedotpost.com/2015/12/henrik-joreteg-pocket-sized-javascript#autoplay ...
